about.title: About Me
about.intro1: I'm a full-stack .NET developer with hands-on experience building web and mobile applications using React, TypeScript, and React Native.
about.intro2: My background as a teacher has given me strong communication skills and the ability to understand users’ needs, collaborate effectively with teams, and turn complex problems into intuitive, maintainable solutions.
about.intro3: I enjoy crafting well-structured code and creating interfaces that are both functional and user-friendly.

hero.title: Theres - fullstack .NET developer
hero.subtitle: I build digital solutions with a variety of technologies.

p1.title: Multiplication App
p1.description: A multiplication practice app with a playful UI. Focuses on learning through repetition and was a project to explore React Native.

p2.title: ConsoleUtilityHub
p2.description: A modular console application with utilities like Calculator, Shapes and Rock Paper Scissors. Built with Spectre.Console for enhanced console UI.

p3.title: ChatterBox
p3.description: A basic customer support chatbot web app with persona and answer limitations. Azure OpenAI is used for bot functionality.

p4.title: SCB Charts
p4.description: A scalable web application displaying data from Statistics Sweden with interactive charts, focusing on API integration and visualization as well as team collaboration.

p5.title: ElevatorSimulator
p5.description: A simulation of an elevator system in a high-rise building. Demonstrates Clean Architecture principles in a .NET backend with a React frontend.

p6.title: Web Portfolio
p6.description: My personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Built with React, TypeScript, and Vite.

contact.title: Contact
contact.lead: I'd love to hear about your project, your ideas or your questions, or do you have a job offer? — send a message and I'll get back to you shortly.
contact.emailNote: Prefer email? Send a note to {{email}}.
contact.error: Failed to send message. See console for details.
